head.supplied: ¶ [...] ¶ ¶ I am sorry that your slips from publications were not returned before this but Baron Mueller wished to prepare the supplementary volume, and I gave up to him on the understanding that he...

div.p: Letter press copy book 2, p. 541, Queensland Herbarium, Brisbane.

I am sorry that your slips from publications were not returned before this but Baron Mueller wished to prepare the supplementary volume, and I gave up to him on the understanding that he would prepare it upon the same plan, classification and so far as possible int he same language as that of the first 7 vols of the work (Flora Australiensis)[.] Now it remains to be seen how far he will do so. I did not wish for the extra work which the preparing of such a volume would have given me but the people were tired of the way in which Baron Mueller was pushing a system of his own and his everlasting change of name. I may here say that the lately published Flora of N S Wales would have been a much more useful work had Bentham been followed.
